alert.note: Alert for Cocke Smoky Mountains; Northwest Cocke (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 1:52PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Cocke County through 345 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Newport, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newport, Parrottsville, Del Rio, Cosby and Hartford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
